stats.name: qbpaa
stats.description: Number of points contributed by a quarterback, accounting for QBR and how much he plays, above the level of an average quarterback.

stats.name: cwepaPassesCondensed
stats.description: Expected points added on pass attempts with low leverage plays down-weighted.

stats.name: cwepaRushes
stats.description: Expected points added on rushes with low leverage plays down-weighted.

stats.name: cwepaSackedCondensed
stats.description: Expected points added on sacks with low leverage plays down-weighted.

stats.name: cwepaPenalties
stats.description: Expected points added on penalties with low leverage plays down-weighted.

stats.name: cwepaTotal
stats.description: Total expected points added with low leverage plays, according to ESPN Win Probability model, down-weighted.

stats.name: actionPlays
stats.description: Plays on which the QB has a non-zero expected points contribution. Includes most plays that are not handoffs.

stats.name: cwAverage
stats.description: Average clutch weight on QB action plays. Smaller than 1 means QB was in relatively fewer clutch situations; greater than 1 means he was in more.

stats.name: qbr
stats.description: Raw Total Quarterback Rating, which values quarterback on all play types on a 0-100 scale (not adjusted for opposing defenses faced)

stats.name: cwepaPasses
stats.description: Clutch-weighted expected points added through completions and incompletions.

stats.name: cwepaInterceptions
stats.description: Clutch-weighted expected points added (lost) through interceptions and returns.

stats.name: cwepaYardsAfterCarry
stats.description: Clutch-weighted expected points added (lost) on yards after the catch above/below expectation.

stats.name: cwepaRuns
stats.description: Clutch-weighted expected points added through rushes

stats.name: cwepaScrambles
stats.description: Clutch-weighted expected points added through improvised scrambles.

stats.name: cwepaSacked
stats.description: Clutch-weighted expected points added (lost) from sacks (not fumbles that may occur because of sacks).

stats.name: cwepaFumbles
stats.description: Clutch-weighted expected points added (lost) through fumbles, recoveries, and returns.

stats.name: schedAdjQBR
stats.description: Adjusted Total Quarterback Rating, which values the quarterback on all play types on a 0-100 scale adjusted for the strength of opposing defenses faced.
